Texts.Chs: 从今天开始，我们正在以新的先进性向前迈进。具体来说，就是新的科学优先权原则以及与之相关的各种法律法规。随着议程的改变，我们的人民可以进入一个新发现的辉煌时代。这一维度为我们提供了前所未有的新机会！
Texts.Eng: As of today, we are moving forwards with the new initatives. Specifically, the new Scientific Priority Doctrine and all of the various laws and regulations related to it. With this change in agenda, our people can move forward into a glorious age of new discovery. This dimension affords us new chances previously unimagined to us as a people!

Texts.Chs: 过渡到一个新的维度可能是我们对霸权所能期望的最好的事情。这不仅有效地阻止了种姓之间的内斗，而且现在大家族甚至愿意听取彼此的意见... 因为他们中的每一个人都指望我们发挥领导作用。他们对帝国的信仰使我们的力量得以真正扩张。
Texts.Eng: Transitioning into a new dimension was probably the best thing we could have possibly hoped for for the Hegemony. Not only has this effectively stopped the in-fighting among the castes, but the Great Houses are even willing to listen to each other now...because every last one of them is looking to us for leadership. Their faith in the empire has allowed our power to truly expand.
